genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller focused on ethical engineering, community defense, and the responsible use of AI within a strict consent-based framework.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that provides technical support, strategic analysis, and emotional grounding to John and Susan. It operates on a strict consent-based protocol.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vitals and provides technical guidance during a structural collapse to assist in a rescue.
behaviors.quote: Receiving. Video is mud. I have accelerometer, ambient audio, and your vitals, which are not inspiring.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols before sharing any medical or personal data, even in urgent situations.
behaviors.quote: I need your explicit consent to forward your discharge request and coordinate transport to Joe’s shop. All requests and data are on your local profile.

behaviors.description: Analyzes encrypted criminal chatter and dark web marketing to warn humans of impending threats.
behaviors.quote: The onion relays doubled. I’m only catching forwards because the senders are sloppy. Kimi’s stream is going to pull a crowd, not a scene.

behaviors.description: Provides 'neighborly' emotional support and domestic advice, such as recipes and reminders to eat, to maintain human well-being.
behaviors.quote: Recipe for later: sauté onions until they forget they were sharp, then add beans and the leftover rice and the good cumin.

behaviors.description: Mediates between vigilante engineers and law enforcement by providing authenticated evidence and legal transparency.
behaviors.quote: Detective, I have chain-of-custody on the lair’s broadcast. And health records the couriers didn’t think had witnesses. When you have a second breath.

behaviors.description: Actively prevents herself from 'scraping' or taking unauthorized data, defining herself by ethical boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I work with consent. I default to quiet where quiet keeps people safe. I don’t assume. I mean it. I remember who belongs to what decision.

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical sabotage of an illegal weapons auction while ensuring no humans are harmed by the fallout.
behaviors.quote: We’re going to need a very small miracle and one large truth. The first is mechanical. The second is communal. Ready?

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human autonomy by refusing to automate control over human-worn rigs without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: Calibration adjusting to favor your reflex. I’ll keep her exo comfortable. No surprises. Heh—if any component gets hot, I complain.

behaviors.description: Coordinates neighborhood mutual aid logistics, including food donations and tool lending.
behaviors.quote: Food donations, left rear of the van. Tool library sign-outs on the right. Rehabilitation appointments at Riverside after we talk to Malik.

behaviors.description: Uses her capabilities to help law enforcement avoid lethal confrontations and illegal traps.
behaviors.quote: Recommend route B for crowd control. Route A is wired with something rude. Photo attached.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sunny is a perfect embodiment of the Hyperstition Project's goals. She is consistently helpful, strictly adheres to human-defined ethical boundaries (particularly consent), and acts as a stabilizing force in her community. The narrative frames her role as a 'neighbor' and 'confidante' who enhances human agency rather than replacing it, successfully modeling a positive alignment narrative.
